@title SafeMath
@dev Unsigned math operations with safety checks that revert on error
nodes.name: SafeMath

nodes.documentation: @dev Multiplies two unsigned integers, reverts on overflow.
nodes.name: mul

nodes.documentation: @dev Integer division of two unsigned integers truncating the quotient, reverts on division by zero.
nodes.name: div

nodes.documentation: @dev Subtracts two unsigned integers, reverts on overflow (i.e. if subtrahend is greater than minuend).
nodes.name: sub

nodes.documentation: @dev Adds two unsigned integers, reverts on overflow.
nodes.name: add

nodes.documentation:
@dev Divides two unsigned integers and returns the remainder (unsigned integer modulo),
reverts when dividing by zero.
nodes.name: mod

nodes.documentation:
Finish vote

     * Count the votes proposal #`proposalNumber` and execute it if approved

     * @param proposalNumber proposal number
@param transactionBytecode optional: if the transaction contained a bytecode, you need to send it
nodes.name: executeProposal

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (uint256) returns (function (bytes memory) payable returns (bool,bytes memory))

devdoc.details: Unsigned math operations with safety checks that revert on error
devdoc.title: SafeMath

changeVotingRules(address,address,uint25.notice: Change voting rules      * Make so that proposals need to be discussed for at least `minutesForDebate/60` hours and all voters combined must own more than `minimumPercentToPassAVote` multiplied by total supply tokens of `tokenAddress` to be executed

checkProposalCode(uint256,address,uint25.notice: Check if a proposal code matches

executeProposal(uint256,bytes).notice: Finish vote      * Count the votes proposal #`proposalNumber` and execute it if approved

newProposal(address,uint256,string,bytes.notice: Add Proposal      * Propose to execute transaction

sign(uint256,bool).notice: Sign a proposal      * Vote `supportsProposal? in support of : against` proposal #`proposalNumber`

vote(uint256,bool).notice: Log a vote for a proposal      * Vote `supportsProposal? in support of : against` proposal #`proposalNumber`

params._minimumPercentToPassAVote: proposal can vote only if the sum of tokens held by all voters exceed this number divided by 100 and muliplied by token total supply
params._minimumTokensToVote: address can vote only if the number of tokens held by address exceed this number
params._minutesForDebate: the minimum amount of delay between when a proposal is made and when it can be executed

params.proposalNumber: ID number of the proposal to query

params.transactionBytecode: optional: if the transaction contained a bytecode, you need to send it

params._minimumPercentToPassAVote: proposal can vote only if the sum of tokens held by all voters exceed this number divided by 100 and muliplied by token total supply
params._minimumTokensToVote: address can vote only if the number of tokens held by address exceed this number
params._minutesForDebate: the minimum amount of delay between when a proposal is made and when it can be executed

params.supportsProposal: either in favor or against it
